posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rhys
Big Stack of T206 repros from the 1980's.  These are from one of those licenced repro sets they made in a long box called "the monster" that I had as a kid before I could afford any of the originals.  I dont think this stack is complete but it has what looks to me to be about 475-500 cards.  I dont need them anymore and if anyone else wants to pay $15 to cover the shipping to mail them to you, you can have them to enjoy.  First e mail gets em.

themodo@hotmail.com

Rhys
